"I'm not such a fool. . . . Just you try it on. . . . Allez-vous promener/' 1 she used to say. Often seeing the success she had with young and old men and women Pierre could not un- derstand why he did not love her. 
"Yes, I never loved her," said he to himself; "I knew she was a depraved woman," he re- peated, "but dared not admit it to myself. And now there's D61okhov sitting in the snow with a forced
